display_long_description:
Welcome to "The Cooking Game VR," the ultimate gastronomic battleground where your culinary skills are put to the ultimate test. In this immersive, virtual reality game, you'll step into two incredibly themed restaurants: a bustling fast food joint and an authentic Italian pizzeria.

Prepare to serve a mouth-watering array of dishes from sizzling hotdogs, juicy burgers, crispy fries & fizzy sodas to baking perfect pizzas in a traditional oven, creating creamy risottos, and serving up some of Italy's finest wines and cheeses.

But it's more than just cooking! You'll have to compete in a "Battle of the Chef," where you'll go against a formidable AI in a race against time to serve a line of hungry customers. Or you could challenge your online friends in an adrenaline-pumping PvP mode.

Be prepared to manage chaotic situations like kitchen fires, pesky spiders, and mischievous pigeons trying to steal your food. Your ability to keep your cool under pressure will truly be tested!

The fun doesn't stop there. As you complete missions, you'll earn coins that can be used to upgrade your kitchen items. Spatulas, pans, ovens, and more can be enhanced to help you keep up with the increasing pace and demands of your customers.

With a multitude of levels, each with its own unique goals, you'll be cooking, serving, and battling your way to the top of the culinary world. It's time to don your chef's hat, sharpen your knives, and get ready for the most exciting cooking experience in VR
